author: Joni Hutchins

review: We now have four of these little beauties. One we use when we travel.  The other three are in our house and work fine together in the same environment.  You just give them different names.  While our most used feature is Netflix, we also stream directly from our iPads.  You simply select the Apple TV box you want the iPad to connect to.  They install easy and work flawlessly.  But they don't (won't) have an App for Amazon Prime.  That's our only complaint, as sometimes the program we want to watch is not available on any other service.
author: David J. Martin "Opera Lover"

review: Apple TV is just so perfect for family with all Apple's products. So convenience. Easy to set up and use also.

review: It has become the core of late night entertainment as it flawlessly handles Netflix and its vast library of TV and movies.  The remote control is the paradigm of simplicity and function in one.

review: We like this more than we expected we would. Can't wait for Apple to add more services. We also have a blueray player that has network services, and the Apple TV is a completely different (faster, easier to use, more elegant) experience.
